name: Flappy 2048 3D
description:
► Fly, jump and collect cubes with numbers, avoiding any obstacles you may find on the way!
► Endless fun in full 3D!

This application is still in an early version, but from now on public available!
If you have problems, please e-mail to: crew@starshipstudio.com

IN FUTURE RELEASES:
► Achievements
► Rankings
